notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.A.G. and M.S. performed the chemical composition of the extract, the antioxidant activities and wrote the paper. S.R. and M.F.M. performed the anti-inflammatory, antinociceptive and antipyretic activities and wrote the paper. A.M.E. analyzed the data and revised the paper. M.W. revised the paper and conceived the study.
